stagnate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to stop developing or making progress
stagnate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Growth is expected to stagnate next year.
stagnate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if an economy or industry stagnates, it does not grow, or it grows only very slowly
stagnate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The construction industry is stagnating and there has been a steep fall in new orders.
